response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe will greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its high value and quality, we are confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its worth to both parties, I propose a purchase price of $14,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its market value and your perceived worth, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
